name: Modified Rule in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
description: A rule has been modified in the Windows Firewall exception list
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2005 AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:(/[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\ \([Xx]86\)\\.*/ OR /[Cc]\:\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\.*/)))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:2005 AND (NOT ((winlog.event_data.ModifyingApplication:(C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\* OR C\:\\Program\ Files\\*)))))`
